landingBase.title: Hello and a very warm welcome!
landingBase.description: We are a customer-service oriented team of developers committed to the highest quality of our work and we stand behind it.

aboutContainer.title: About Us
aboutContainer.description: We are a highly skilled and motivated team of developers and designers that will transform your ideas into working business solutions.
aboutContainer.text: Our team provides a wide range of complex services in software development and specific IT solutions. Large scaled projects with high requirements to applied solutions-- flexible business oriented architecture.
aboutContainer.services: We are involved into development of various projects for different professional fields, such as:

items.text: Creation of highload portals and social networking products, web services;
Management and development of corporate (business) applications;
IT solutions for e-commerce, internet stores, e-commerce apps;
Solutions for tourist, hotel and restaurant business;
Web applications for all types of systems;
High data loads, scalability and expandable solutions, Security support;
24 hour Technical support, real time monitoring, IT experts services and estimation (IT-consulting)

items.text: ...Have no hesitation in dealing with you again and would recommend your service.

items.text: Well all I can say is “EPIC”! The car is incredible. My old 335d seems like something from another time.

items.text: Darren was fantastic and really helpful during my visit, and as usual, I was a pain with arrangements out if my control but he accommodated them perfectly and work around it, which was extremely grateful

expertsContainer.title: We Are Your Experts
expertsContainer.description: We utilize only the latest technologies and have extensive experience in the following areas:

items.text: JavaScript, Node, Express, React, Redux, Webpack, Angular, MEAN, Ruby and Ruby on Rails, Python, PHP, BaaS, HBase, Babel, Mongodb, SQLite, MySQL, Big Data Apache Spark; Cassandra, HTML5, CSS3, HAML, jade, Sass, PostCSS, Stylus and Gulp, d3js and other UX/UI Design, Material Design, Animation and Motion, scrum, agile etc.
